name: eggd_vcf2xls_nirvana
title: eggd_vcf2xls_nirvana
summary: Create xls from Nirvana annotated vcf

inputSpec.name: list_panel_names_genes
inputSpec.label: List of comma-separated panels or comma-separated genes (prefixed with "_")

inputSpec.name: annotations
inputSpec.label: List of comma-separated names of fields in the vcf to annotate the report with

inputSpec.name: exclude_cols
inputSpec.label: Exclude columns
inputSpec.help: Columns of VCF to exclude from output xlsx

inputSpec.name: include_cols
inputSpec.label: Include columns
inputSpec.help: Columns of VCF to only include in output xlsx

inputSpec.name: reorder_cols
inputSpec.label: Reorder columns
inputSpec.help: Order of fields from VCF in output xlsx columns

inputSpec.name: rename_cols
inputSpec.label: Rename columns
inputSpec.help: = separated key value pairs of VCF fields to rename in output xlsx

inputSpec.name: keep
inputSpec.label: Keep
inputSpec.help: Determines if to keep filtered variants in separate 'filtered' tab

inputSpec.name: add_name
inputSpec.label: Add sample name
inputSpec.help: Determines if to add samplename as first column in each sheet

inputSpec.name: sheets
inputSpec.label: Sheet names
inputSpec.help: Names to use for sheets where multiple VCFs are passed

inputSpec.name: output
inputSpec.label: Output prefix
inputSpec.help: Prefix for naming output xlsx file

inputSpec.name: merge
inputSpec.label: Merge
inputSpec.help: Determines if to merge multiplke VCFs to one sheet

inputSpec.name: flagstat_file
inputSpec.label: Flagstat file for displaying number of reads in the report

inputSpec.name: genepanels_file
inputSpec.label: Genepanels file
inputSpec.help: File with all panels and their genes. Contains panel name, panel_id, gene_symbol tab-separated

inputSpec.name: bioinformatic_manifest
inputSpec.label: Bioinformatic manifest
inputSpec.help: File with record of samples ran with which panels. Contains sample_id, panel name, panel_id, gene_symbol tab-separated

inputSpec.name: nirvana_genes2transcripts
inputSpec.label: Nirvana_genes2transcripts
inputSpec.help: File with the genes and their transcripts chosen by the team to match nirvana. Contains gene_symbol, transcript_id (NM) tab-separated

inputSpec.name: panel_bed
inputSpec.label: Panel bed that matches panel name provided
